Package ohos.powermanager

Class DevicePowerStatusInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.powermanager.DevicePowerStatusInfo

  • public class DevicePowerStatusInfo
extends Object
    Obtains the power status of a device.

    The power status includes the charging status, battery level, and system power status.

    Since:
    1

    • Method Detail

      • getPowerState

        public PowerManager.PowerState getPowerState​()
        Obtains the system power status of a device.

        The status can be NONE, AWAKE, INACTIVE, or SLEEP.

        Returns:
        Returns the power status, which is specified in PowerState.
        Since:
        1

      • getBatteryLevel

        public BatteryInfo.BatteryLevel getBatteryLevel​()
        Obtains the battery level of a device.

        The battery level can be HIGH, NORMAL, LOW, or EMERGENCY.

        Returns:
        Returns the battery level, which is specified in BatteryLevel.
        Since:
        1

      • getBatteryChargingStatus

        public BatteryInfo.BatteryChargeState getBatteryChargingStatus​()
        Obtains the charging status of a device.

        The charging status can be NONE, ENABLE, DISABLE, or FULL.

        Returns:
        Returns the charging status, which is specified in PowerState.
        Since:
        1

      • getDevicePowerStatusInfo

        public static DevicePowerStatusInfo getDevicePowerStatusInfo​()
        Obtains a DevicePowerStatusInfo object.

        The object can be used to call a method (such as getBatteryLevel()) to obtain detailed information of the device.

        Returns:
        Returns the DevicePowerStatusInfo object.
        Since:
        1
